You've found the documentation for Dash Bootstrap Components! Read the Quick Start, check out the available components or check out the examples.

import dash
import dash_bootstrap_components as dbc

app = dash.Dash(external_stylesheets=[dbc.themes.BOOTSTRAP])

app.layout = dbc.Button("Click me!")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    app.run_server()
